keyMoments.title: Camel's Debut
keyMoments.description: Camel, a giant penguin companion of former Admiral Kuzan (Aokiji), is shown traveling with his master toward Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Kuzan's loyal companion and foreshadowing of Aokiji's arrival at Punk Hazard.

abilities.description: As a super penguin, Camel is exceptionally good at treading water and swimming.
Camel is capable of cooking barbecue by itself.

relationships.description: Camel is the loyal traveling companion of former Admiral Kuzan (Aokiji).

evolutionMoments.description: Camel is shown traveling with Kuzan toward Punk Hazard.

reveals.information: Camel is Kuzan's giant penguin companion

keyMoments.title: General Cannon Unleashed
keyMoments.description: Franky unleashes his most powerful attack in Shogun form, the General Cannon, a devastating blast of compressed air that damages Buffalo, Baby 5, and the surrounding ice mountains.
keyMoments.significance: First use of Franky's ultimate post-timeskip attack, demonstrating the full power of General Franky Shogun.
keyMoments.quote: The Gaon Cannon has set foot on land! General Cannon!

abilities.description: Franky Shogun's most powerful attack. The arms come together, fill with air, and fire a giant blast of compressed air. A land-based version of the Thousand Sunny's Gaon Cannon.

keyMoments.title: Sickle Girl Form
keyMoments.description: Baby 5 transforms into her Sickle Girl form while being spun by Buffalo, impaling Franky Shogun's left arm and penetrating its armor.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Baby 5's versatile weapon transformation abilities.

abilities.description: Baby 5 transforms part of herself into a large sickle blade, effective for piercing attacks.
Baby 5 transforms into a flying disk shape (anime-original technique).
Baby 5 transforms into a fire-based weapon (anime-original technique).

keyMoments.title: Shooting Star Rush with Seastone
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses his Totsugeki Ryuseigun technique to shoot multiple projectiles, with the final shot being seastone handcuffs that successfully capture Caesar Clown.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's tactical genius by using seastone to neutralize Caesar's Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.quote: Escaping is useless! That last shot was seastone handcuffs!

abilities.description: Usopp shoots several projectiles in rapid succession at targets. Can be loaded with various ammunition including seastone.

keyMoments.title: Thunder Breed Tempo
keyMoments.description: Nami uses her Weather Egg and Gust Sword to create weather conditions, then unleashes Thunder Breed Tempo to knock Buffalo, Baby 5, and Caesar out of the sky with lightning.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Nami's advanced weather manipulation abilities post-timeskip.

abilities.description: Nami creates a powerful lightning attack capable of striking multiple airborne targets.
A weather manipulation technique used to set up atmospheric conditions for other attacks.

keyMoments.title: Trusting Usopp and Nami
keyMoments.description: Luffy stops Law from intervening and declares that Usopp and Nami will handle capturing Caesar, showing complete faith in his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's growth as a captain and his absolute trust in every member of his crew.
keyMoments.quote: Usopp and Nami will handle this.
